Imagery Description: (a) Seated woman in right, enveloped in drapery, holding dish in left hand, (b) siren.
Additional Notes: These two make a pair, but the siren on 21138 has the body of a bird and the head of a woman, while that on 21137 has a woman's torso rising from the bird body. For the draped woman, cf. no. 569.
Artist: Minor Vases from the AsteasNon SepcifiedPython Workshop
